sourcesContent:
Test component

Hello, World

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ templateUrl: './testing.component.html', selector: 'test-component' }) export class TestingComponent implements OnInit { show = false; toggleShow; _toggleShow() { this.show = !this.show; } constructor() { this.show = false; this.toggleShow = this._toggleShow; } ngOnInit() { console.log("Init fired"); } }
